General.Name: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes steel wire rods, steel annealing wires, reinforced concrete bars, screws, and wire products in Thailand. The company offers spheroidized annealing wires, bolts, and thread rods; and engages in trading activities. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Rayong, Thailand. Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Tycoons Group International Co., Ltd.
